summary: Utility module that provides helper functions to convert 2D/3D medical images (NumPy arrays or PyTorch tensors) into TensorBoard-compatible visualizations, including static image summaries and animated GIFs, handling rescaling and dataâ€‘type conversion.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to log and inspect medical imaging data during model training and evaluation through TensorBoard, improving model debugging, performance monitoring, and result presentation.
